title: Courteney Cox Just Hit the Hot Tub with David Beckham, and Her Fans Went Wild
text:
From Harper's BAZAAR

Courteney Cox posted a cozy Instagram selfie taken with David Beckham in a hot tub.

In a second selfie, Cox and Beckham posed with Modern Family stars Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Eric Stonestreet.

Cox and Beckham are set to cameo in the TV show's final season.

Courteney Cox made all of her fans a little hot under the collar this weekend when she posted a selfie taken with soccer star David Beckham.

Cox and Beckham snuggled up in a hot tub, and it's impossible to deny that they make a cute couple. But before anyone starts getting worried, it's worth noting that the Friends star and the soccer player are merely working together.

Along with the caption, "Too hot in the hot tub! #modernfamily," Cox shared a second selfie which also featured Modern Family actors Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Eric Stonestreet.

Still, we weren't the only ones excited about Cox's snap with Beckham. Her former Friends co-star, Jennifer Aniston, couldn't resist commenting, "Wait....WHAT'S HAPPENING?!!??" along with some pretty choice emojis. Stonestreet was quick to reply, "I liked it," and we definitely did, too.

The Beckhams visited the Modern Family set way back in August 2017, hinting even then that David was a huge fan of the show.

According to Entertainment Weekly, Cox and Beckham were recently confirmed to be appearing in Modern Family's final season, along with Jordan Peele, Elizabeth Banks, and Edward Norton. And judging by Cox's hot tub snap, the final season is going to be lit.
